trans-unit.target: Adressa dad e-mail (na vegn betg publitgada)

trans-unit.source: Notify me of new comments by e-mail
trans-unit.target: M'infurmar via e-mail davart novs commentaris

trans-unit.source: You need to be logged in to add comments.
trans-unit.target: Ti stos t'annunziar per pudair agiuntar commentaris.

trans-unit.source:
%s has created a new comment on your website.
---
%s
---
View: %s Edit: %s
If you are moderating comments, you have to log in to the back end to publish it.
trans-unit.target:
%s ha scrit in nov commentari sin tia pagina d'internet.
---
%s
---
Mussar: %s Modifitgar: %s
Sche ti modereschas ils commentaris stos ti t'annunziar en il back-end per publitgar els.

trans-unit.source: Your comment has been added and is now pending for approval.
trans-unit.target: Tes commentari è vegnì agiunta e sto vegnir acceptà.

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
please confirm that you want to be notified of new comments by e-mail on this page:
%s
---
Confirm: %s Cancel: %s
trans-unit.target:
Olla %s,
conferma p. pl. che ti vuls vegnir infurmà per e-mail davart novs commentaris sin questa pagina:
%s
---
Confermar: %s Interrumper: %s

trans-unit.source: A new comment has been added on %s
trans-unit.target: In nov commentari è vegnì scrit sin %s

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
a new comment has been added on a page you have subscribed to:
%s
---
To cancel your subscription, please click here: %s
trans-unit.target:
Olla %s,
in nov commentari è vegnì scrit sin questa pagina che ti has abunà:
%s
---
Per betg pli vegnir infurmà davart novs commentaris pos ti cliccar qua: %s
